verse: ब्रह्मानंदेन पूर्णाहं तेनानंदेन तृप्तधीः ।\n तथापि शून्यमात्मानं मन्ये कृष्णरतिं विना ॥

terms.ब्रह्मानंदेन: with the bliss of Brahman (ultimate reality)

meaning: Meaning:With the bliss of Brahman, I am complete and content. However, I still consider my self vacant without devotion towards Krishna. Breakdown:
